com.ibm.ecm.api.coresdk.model

Interface IBMECMTextSearchPredicateBuilder


  • public interface IBMECMTextSearchPredicateBuilder
    Represents builder for IBMECMTextSearchPredicate.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IBMECMTextSearchPredicate advanced(String text, IBMECMTextSearchType searchType)
      Advanced syntax for terms in text.
      IBMECMTextSearchPredicate all(String text, IBMECMTextSearchType searchType)
      Search results are returned only if they match all search predicates.
      IBMECMTextSearchPredicate any(String text, IBMECMTextSearchType searchType)
      Search results are returned if they match any search predicate.
